trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a sor kapcsolatos <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> események.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewRowEventArgs class provides data for the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NewRowNeeded> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderCellChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserAddedRow> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletedRow> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDividerHeightChanged>
trans-unit.target: A DataGridViewRowEventArgs osztály adatokat biztosít a következő <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>események:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NewRowNeeded>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderCellChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserAddedRow>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletedRow>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDividerHeightChanged></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDividerHeightChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletedRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserAddedRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderCellChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NewRowNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `dataGridViewRow` parameter value to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ez a konstruktor használja a `dataGridViewRow` inicializálása paraméter értéke a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that the event occurred for.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> associated with the event.
